ABOUT

Sightly
Visually appealing user interfaces according to design principles.
Responsive
My layouts will work on any device, big or small.
Intuitive
Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX.
Fast
Fast load times and lag free interaction.

Who's this guy?

Frontend developer with a with a deep love for crafting elegant and interactive user experiences. A keen eye for design and an understanding of UI/UX principles drive my commitment to creating responsive web applications. Got a drive to stay updated with the latest industry trends. Let's make something special!

SKILLS & TOOLS

JavaScript
Widely used scripting language for web development and dynamic interactivity.
Typescript
A statically typed superset of JavaScript for scalable and maintainable applications.
React
A popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces and interactive components.
Redux
A predictable state management library for managing complex application states.
HTML 5
Latest version of hypertext markup language for modern web content and structure.
CSS 3
Latest version of cascading style sheets for styling web elements and layouts.
SASS
CSS preprocessor enhancing stylesheets with variables, nesting, and more.
GIT
Distributed version control system for tracking code changes collaboratively.
Figma
Cloud-based design tool for UI/UX, prototyping, and collaboration.
GSAP
Powerful JavaScript animation library.
MUI
Popular React UI framework following Material Design guidelines
Gulp
Task runner automating repetitive development tasks in web projects.

I try to learn something new every day, so this list is probably not exhaustive. 🙂

PROJECTS

Weather here
Cross-platform application to check current and future weather anywhere in the world.
Used: React / RESTful API
Desktop chess
Desktop application for playing chess with a history of moves and various time limits.
Used: Typescript
Yummy
Сross-platform application for finding recipes for every taste with plenty of filters.
Used: React / RESTful API
